title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Kamala Harris tweets about "long weekend" for Memorial Day. Maggie Haberman: We didn't believe the Wuhan-leak theory because it came from Trump. Cotton, Gottlieb on Wuhan lab-leak theory. Rush was way ahead of the curve when he analyzed Xi Jinping touring Wuhan. Hunter Biden laptop story still ignored. Rush on the Drive-By Media. Texas Democrats block GOP election reforms. Rush on why Democrats can't want honest elections. Fauci writes memoir.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

It's back to incestuous business as usual in Biden's Washington. Rush on the conflicts of interest in the swamp. Callers on the origins of the virus and the corporate tax rate. Biden administration flying BLM flag at U.S. embassies around the world. New poll shows one-third of Americans believe U.S. involvement in WW2 was a mistake. Rush on what the flag means.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Justice Thomas goes viral teasing TMZ reporter. Rush on the real Clarence Thomas. What would be the ChiCom motive for releasing the virus? Tennis player Naomi Osaka announces she's taking time off to deal with mental health issues. Rush on how liberals politicized tennis when Osaka defeated Serena Williams in 2018. WH confirms cyberattack against meat supply. EIB High Note: Grandson helps grandfather's Spitfire dream come true. Caller who was in Wuhan.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
